document.booking_confirmation_message:
Thank you for booking your spot at the Chef's Corner event featuring Chef Taiyaba at 2 Moons. We're thrilled to have you join us for this culinary extravaganza!

Event Details:

Date: May 18th

Time: 12pm - 3pm

Please arrive on time to ensure you don't miss any of the exciting experiences we have planned, including the Hands-on Lucknowi Cuisine Experience and the Wine Tasting and Pairing session with Campo Viejo.

Should you have any questions or require further assistance, feel free to reach out to us. We look forward to providing you with a memorable and delicious experience!

document.name: Chef's Corner at 2 Moons ft. Chef Taiyaba
document.short_description:
Chef's Corner at 2 Moons featuring Chef Taiyaba


Chef Taiyaba unveils the secrets of Lucknowi cuisine during our Hands-on Lucknowi Cuisine Experience. Join us for an unforgettable afternoon of culinary delights and cultural immersion.


📅 Date: May 18th  

🕛 Time: 12pm - 3pm  


In association with Campo Viejo, we're thrilled to enhance your experience with an exclusive Wine Tasting and Pairing session. Savor the finest wines expertly paired with each dish, curated to elevate your taste buds and enrich your senses.



🍽️ Menu Highlights:


Tawa Kawabs:

  • Galawati Kabab (Mutton)
  • Bhuni Kaleji (Chicken Liver)

Deep Fry:

  • Chapli Kabab (Chicken)

Grill:

  • Til ke Prawns/ Anardana Jhinga
  • Bihari Kabab
  • Amritsari Fish Tikka

Accompaniments:

  • Chutney
  • Salad
  • Breads


🍷 Tasting and Pairing with -

- Campo Viejo Tempranillo 

- Campo Viejo Blanco


Terms and Conditions -

  • Ticket sales are final and non-refundable, available online only through designated platforms.
  • Entry is granted with a valid ticket; attendees must be 18 or older for wine tasting.
  • Prompt arrival is recommended as the event starts on time; latecomers may miss segments.
  • No shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means. Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.
  • Alcoholic beverages are served only to legal drinkers.
  • Attendees consent to being photographed or recorded for promotional purposes.
  • Unforeseen circumstances may lead to event postponement, rescheduling, or cancellation, with efforts made for ticket transfers.

document.name: Sandwich Shop with Chefs Chris & Delzad

custom_questions.question: Number of vegetarians in the group
Number of Non- vegetarians in the group

document.short_description:
Sandwich Shop the Conservatory!

Indulge in a two-day ‘Sandwich Shop’ at the Conservatory showcasing the culinary mastery of Chef Christopher Fernandes and Delzad. Come, grab, eat & go!


MENU FOR THE SANDWICH SHOP 


1.⁠ ⁠Monte Cristo (₹845)

Smoked homemade ham, aged cheddar, egg dipped (slice white loaf) 


2.⁠ ⁠Brisket Grill Cheese (₹1040)

18hrs smoked Brisket grilled cheese, brioche loaf, honey mustard, caramelised onions, smoked scaromza, pickles, and bonemarrow butter.


3.⁠ ⁠Spicy Chicken Donut (₹845)

Grilled Chicken s/w ( honey chipotle grilled chicken leg, smoked cream cheese, donut, truffle honey) -


4.⁠ ⁠Mojo Pork Sandwich (₹845)

pulled mojo pork, potato bun, smoked buffalo-style hot sauce, pickles 


5.⁠ ⁠Umame Mushroom (₹715)

Wild mix mushrooms, shitake miso, mozzarella 


6.⁠ ⁠Burrata Baguette (₹682)

Roast eggplant, smoked pepper tapenade, baby Burrata, Balsamic glaze, rocket


Terms and Conditions:

  • The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an event.
  • Do not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.
  • Each slot, lasting 2 hours only, requires attendance at the booked time, with no accommodation for attendance at any other slot except the one booked.
  • No shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.
  • Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.
  • The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.
  • Children over 7 years of age require a ticket.
  • Children below the age of 7 are not allowed.
  • No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.
  • Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.
  • Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.
  • The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval of theirs.

account_data.company_description: Immerse yourself in an era gone by...

document.booking_confirmation_message:
Hi there!


We are so excited to take you on an exciting journey, travelling back in time, visiting an era gone by!


Here is the link to our location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/cPznXQ7hgfugF5sf8?g_st=iw


We will need a minimum of 15 individuals to conduct the tour. Incase there is a cancellation due to the numbers, we will let you know 48 hours before the day of the event.


A few things to keep in mind. As most of these vehicles are over a 100 years old and extremely delicate, we do not allow for guests to sit inside, however you are most welcome to take photographs.

As the tour involves a lot of walking through an estate surrounded by a beautiful canopy of trees, please wear comfortable shoes.


We can't wait to share our portal into the past with you!


See you soon!


Warmly,

Rupali

document.name: Private Tour of the Automotive Wonders  of the World!
document.short_description:
For a limited group of individuals, we will open out a treasure trove hidden in Bangalore! 

You will get to experience the restoration, preservation & collection of Historic Cars, Motorcycles, Carriages and all things automotive passionately built over the past 40 years!

default_section.label: What's included
default_section.text:
A guided tour of a private collection of Vintage & Classic Automobiles dating back to the 1800s
Learn about the stories, the history & behind the scenes restoration
A visit to the Restoration Workshop
Refreshments
The duration of the entire experience is approximately 2.5 hours
This tour is for a minimum group size of 15 individuals and maximum of 20 individuals
Age Group: 12 years and above

document.name: Slow Tide at The Conservatory
document.short_description:
Slow Tide at The Conservatory

Interpreting the Indian coastline in 5 plates


Slow Tide, once a small fishing enclave, geographically, and socially, withdrawn from mainstreams of otherworldliness. Discovered and embraced by a global gathering, bringing about the ‘Anjuna Commune’. Free spirits, making their way across exotic Asia on an adventure-filled land route, seeking the unconventional. Growing up here, ‘Anjunkars’ understand that it’s okay to live a life others don’t understand. 

Founded by Neil Dsouza, a Goan living in Bombay who moved back to Goa during the pandemic. Slow Tide, conceived during the pandemic redefines the Anjuna Shack. The successful revival of Anjuna's hippie culture by award-winning Architect Palinda Kannangara is reflected in the space, which changes "Fable" to "Table." Born in Rajagiriya, Sri Lanka, Palinda’s contextual sensitivity and experimental use of material carried our story forward. Inspired by frequent stays with us over the years, the site has become a generator of all ideas, designs never frozen but continuing to evolve. 


Vegetarian Menu

Pineapple & Grapes Sasam

Chilli-Lime Rubbed Pineapple & Grapes Sasam Salad with Curried Cashew Sauce & Caramel Rice Puff


Brussels Sprouts & Pumpkin Thoran Tostada

Brussels Sprouts & Pumpkin Thoran with Fermented Bean Pure & Poppy Seeds Crumble


Chiapas Grilled New Corn

Charred New Corn with Borracha New Cron with Goat cheese, Pickled lime Salsa & Puffed Jowar


Wild Mushroom Caldine Momos

Wild Mushroom Momos with Caldine Curry, Radish-Peanut Oistou & Lime Oil


Puran-Coconut Pataleo

Gram & Coconut Pataleo with Jaggery caramel Sauce & Almond Granola


Non- Vegetarian Menu

Red Snapper Crudo

Red Snapper Ceviche with Chilli-Tamarind Sauce & Seaweed Rice Crisp


Back Waters Crab Cake

Green Pepper & Betel Leaf Spiced Crab Cake with Cilantro-Green Apple Chutney & Recheado Aioli


Ceylon Pork Curry Taco

Sri lankan Blackened Spiced Pork Belly Curry & Pol Roti With Sambol


Mutton Alooni Bhaat

Goan Mutton (Meat & Bone) Stew with Indrayani Rice Khichadi & Muttton Pickle


Puran-Coconut Pataleo

Gram & Coconut Pataleo with Jaggery caramel Sauce & Almond Granola


Terms and Conditions :

  • The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an event.
  • Do not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.
  • Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.
  • Children above 5 years will require a ticket to attend the meal
  • Children below the age of 5 are not allowed.
  • The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.
  • No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.
  • Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.
  • Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.
  • The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval of theirs.
  • Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. Incase you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

document.booking_confirmation_message:
Hey!

We are excited to host you at TwoTables. Come prepared to meet a bunch of diverse folks & have fun conversations.Our host will be present at the table to help you settle down and facilitate conversations.


Whether you're new in town, looking to expand your social circle, or simply enjoy meeting new people, this event is perfect for you. There's no pressure, just good vibes and good company.

Don't miss out on the chance to mix, mingle, and make memories.
document.cancellation_policy:
Refunds:

Refunds will be issued only in cases where the event is cancelled by the organizers.

Refund requests made by attendees will be considered up to 2 days prior to the event date.

A processing fee may apply to refund requests initiated by attendees.

Refunds will be processed within 2 business days after approval.


Cancellations:

Attendees must notify the organizers of any cancellations at least 2 days before the event date.

Cancellations made after the specified deadline may not be eligible for a refund.

The organizers reserve the right to cancel or reschedule the event due to unforeseen circumstances. In such cases, attendees will be notified promptly, and refunds will be issued accordingly.


Transfer of Tickets:

Tickets are non-transferable without prior approval from the organizers.

Requests for ticket transfers must be made in writing and approved by the organizers.


No-show Policy:

Attendees who do not show up for the event without prior notice will not be eligible for a refund.

By registering for the event, attendees agree to abide by the refund and cancellation policy outlined above. The organizers reserve the right to amend or update this policy as necessary.

document.name: Breakfast with Strangers
document.short_description:
Are you ready to start your day with a delightful twist? We’re hosting a Breakfast with Strangers Table, and we’d love for you to join us!


At the Breakfast Table, we believe in the power of connecting with new faces over a delicious meal. It’s a chance to step out of your comfort zone, spark interesting conversations, and maybe even make some new friends along the way.


Whether you’re new to the city, looking to expand your social circle, or simply enjoy meeting new people, this table is perfect for you. We’ll provide the food, the cozy ambiance, and plenty of conversation starters.


All you need to bring is yourself and an open mind!
